titleInfo.title: 'File 6/47 Claim of Mr S M Ghaus against the Bahrain Government - Correspondence regarding'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 47; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 4-46; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence relating to a claim for payment against the Government of Bahrain. The correspondence is between the Political Agency in Bahrain, the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain (Charles Dalrymple Belgrave), and the claimant, Mr S Muhammad Ghaus.The claim was made for extra work done during construction projects for the government by Mr Ghaus's firm, Ahmadia Business House. The correspondence covers the discussion over the issue and the Political Agent's (Captain Charles Geoffrey Prior) final arbitration (folios 41-45).
